text: this is your first English mini lesson
in these mini lessons I plan to share
something interesting and useful in one
minute or less today is February 29th it
reminds us that 2008 is a leap year that
means we have 366 days and not 365 how
do you remember which months have 30
days and which months have 31 American
schoolchildren often learn a rhyme to
help them remember there are different
versions but let me share one of them
with you it goes like this thirty days
has September April June and November
all the rest have 31 except February
which has 28 and fine till leap year
